tech_news.title: Meet The New Ford New Mustang Dark Horse SC - Motor1.com
tech_news.description: We get an early look at the new Mustang Dark Horse SC with a Formula 1 pro behind the wheel. Watch the full video.

tech_news.title: Nvidia’s new app update includes DLSS 4.5 and more Control Panel features - The Verge
tech_news.description: Nvidia is rolling out DLSS 4.5 to all RTX owners. The latest Nvidia app update includes DLSS 4.5 and more Control Panel features.

tech_news.title: Reprompt attack let hackers hijack Microsoft Copilot sessions - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Researchers identified an attack method dubbed "Reprompt" that could allow attackers to infiltrate a user's Microsoft Copilot session and issue commands to exfiltrate sensitive data.

tech_news.title: Everything new in Livewire 4 - Laravel News
tech_news.description: Livewire 4 is the biggest release yet—featuring single-file components, islands for isolated rendering, built-in drag and drop, optimistic UI, scoped CSS and JavaScript, and more.

tech_news.title: Surprise! Animal Crossing: New Horizons' free 3.0 update for Switch releases early - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Good news, Animal Crossing: New Horizons' free 3.0 Switch update for all owners has been released earlier than we thought.

tech_news.title: Fortinet Fixes Critical FortiSIEM Flaw Allowing Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution - The Hacker News
tech_news.description: Fortinet patches a critical FortiSIEM vulnerability (CVE-2025-64155) that allows unauthenticated remote code execution via exposed phMonitor service.

tech_news.title: Battlefield 6 Season 2 delayed until February, but more content for Season 1 and events are on the way - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Battlefield 6's second season has been delayed.
